properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 6:32AM MST until January 22 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff AZ
properties.description:
* WHAT...Periods of snow. Plan on slippery road conditions. Total
snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, locally higher amounts of
4 to 6 inches near Buffalo Pass.

* WHERE...Areas above 7500 feet near Buffalo Pass and Window
Rock.

* WHEN...Until Midnight MST Tuesday night.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Look for reduced visibilities at times.

Additional snow forecast from 6 AM Today to midnight Tonight:

Buffalo Pass  4 to 6  inches          Ganado  0 to 1  inches
Window Rock  0 to 1  inches
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered
roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT FOR ELEVATIONS ABOVE 7500 FEET
